LanguageData.UT_InstalledStack_Abhorrent.stages.0.des: I had to install a cortical stack. This was deeply offensive to my beliefs.
LanguageData.UT_InstalledStack_Disapproved.stages.0.d: I had to install a cortical stack. This was clearly against my beliefs.
LanguageData.UT_HasStack_Abhorrent.stages.0.label: cortical stack
LanguageData.UT_HasStack_Abhorrent.stages.0.descripti: I have cortical stack installed in me. It's an abhorrent offense against everything I believe!
LanguageData.UT_HasStack_Disapproved.stages.0.label: cortical stack
LanguageData.UT_HasStack_Disapproved.stages.0.descrip: I have cortical stack installed in me. I don't believe such things are acceptable.
LanguageData.UT_HasNoStack_Disapproved.stages.0.label: no cortical stack
LanguageData.UT_HasNoStack_Disapproved.stages.0.descr: I don't have a cortical stack. It's against my beliefs to be able to die so easily.
